input.sentences: we went to a concert last night .
we were so excited to go !
we were part of a very large crowd !
i just wish that we 'd had better seats .
output.sentences: We had great seats for the concert last night.
The lighting displays were really on point.
The overall atmosphere was festive, there were plenty of people but not miserably crowded.
the lead singer gave a really heartfelt tribute to his band mates.
Overall, a great show that concluded with a pyrotechnics display.
